functions.description: Display the BMI calculator web page with a clean, user-friendly layout and intuitive design
Accept user inputs for age, weight, and height in an easily accessible form and validate them to ensure accuracy
Automatically calculate the Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the entered values using the standard formula: BMI = weight_in_kg / (height_in_cm)^2
Display the calculated BMI value clearly and concisely along with a BMI category label (e.g. underweight, healthy weight, overweight, obese)
Provide brief information about what BMI is, how it is calculated, and its clinical significance to help users understand the results better
Offer links to educational resources, such as articles or videos, on healthy weight management and lifestyle changes related to BMI improvement (optional)

functions.function: View default currencies and conversion rates

Allows user to choose the currency they are sending
Allows user to choose the currency they are receiving
Enables user to input the amount in the sender currency
Calculates and displays the equivalent amount in the receiver currency using the latest exchange rates

functions.function: Display result with sufficient decimal places
functions.description: Shows the converted amount with reasonable number of decimals e.g., 4 for monetary values
Allows user to check the latest exchange rates between all supported currencies
Periodically refreshes the displayed exchange rates using a simulation or real-time data source
Provides assistance for users who need guidance on how to use the converter
Allows user to customize certain aspects of the application like default currency or data source (real-time vs simulation)

function.description: Check if the test case is suitable for the defined function.
